name: focus-blast
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.

flavor_text.x_y: The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes its power. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes its power. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.
